ANU.name: Liyana Kayali
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
ANU.biography: Liyana’s research interests encompass resistance, gender, restorative justice, Muslim civil society groups, and the Middle East, with a particular focus on Israel-Palestine. She has published in academic and non-academic outlets including the Canberra Times. She is also the author of Palestinian Women and Popular Resistance: Perceptions, Attitudes, and Strategies (2020), published as part of Routledge's Studies on the Arab-Israeli Conflict series.

publication.title: Palestinian Women and Popular Resistance: Perceptions
publication.source: Attitudesand Strategies, Routledge, Abingdon & New York
